pivot.headerDescription: Calculate CPR, Floor, and Fibonacci pivot points for precise intraday trading decisions
pivot.inputDescription: Enter the previous day's high, low, and close prices
pivot.resultsDescription: Results will appear here after calculation
pivot.title: Pivot Calculator
pivot.subtitle: Professional pivot point analysis for Gold, Silver & Commodities

inputForm.title: Calculate Pivots
inputForm.description: Enter OHLC data or fetch from API

multiTimeframe.title: Multi-Timeframe Pivots
multiTimeframe.description: Daily, Weekly & Monthly with Confluence Detection
multiTimeframe.guideDescription: Master confluence trading with pivot levels
multiTimeframe.confluenceExplanation: When pivot levels from different timeframes align within a small range, they create a confluence zone - a high-probability support/resistance area.
multiTimeframe.highProbabilityLevels: High-probability levels where multiple timeframes align
multiTimeframe.selectSymbolPrompt: Select a symbol and click "Fetch All Timeframes" to view multi-timeframe pivot analysis

distanceCalculator.title: Distance Calculator
distanceCalculator.guideDescription: Understanding price distances to pivot levels
distanceCalculator.nextResistanceDesc: The nearest level above current price. Consider taking profits or placing stop-loss here.
distanceCalculator.nextSupportDesc: The nearest level below current price. Consider buying or placing stop-loss here.
distanceCalculator.nearestLevelDesc: The closest pivot level to current price. Watch for reactions here.

signalDetection.title: Signal Detection
signalDetection.bullishSignalsDesc: Price above CPR or approaching support levels. Consider long positions.
signalDetection.bearishSignalsDesc: Price below CPR or approaching resistance levels. Consider short positions.
signalDetection.warningSignalsDesc: Price near key levels or narrow CPR detected. Be cautious and watch for breakouts.

historicalAccuracy.title: Historical Accuracy
historicalAccuracy.description: Track how often pivot levels are respected over time
historicalAccuracy.guideDescription: Learn how to interpret pivot level performance
historicalAccuracy.respectedExplanation: A level is respected when price approaches it and reverses direction within a tolerance (0.3%). This indicates the level acted as support or resistance.
historicalAccuracy.selectParametersPrompt: Select parameters and click "Analyze" to view historical accuracy

pivotAlerts.title: Pivot Alerts
pivotAlerts.description: Set price alerts for key levels
pivotAlerts.guideDescription: Get notified when price approaches key levels

intradayRecalc.title: Intraday Recalculation
intradayRecalc.guideDescription: Update pivot levels as the day progresses

pivot.exportDescription: Download or share pivot levels for morning prep
pivot.calculateFirstExport: Calculate pivot levels first to enable export
pivot.guideSubtitle: Learn about CPR, Floor Pivots, and Fibonacci levels for intraday trading
pivot.cprDescription: TC, Pivot, BC - Key zone for intraday trend direction and reversals.
pivot.floorPivotsDescription: R1-R3 resistance, S1-S3 support - Classic support/resistance levels.
pivot.fibonacciDescription: 38.2%, 50%, 61.8% - Golden ratio retracement for precision entries.
pivot.tradingStrategyDescription: Buy near support, sell near resistance with proper stop losses.

multiTimeframePivots.title: Multi-Timeframe Pivots
multiTimeframePivots.description: Compare pivot levels across daily, weekly, and monthly timeframes
multiTimeframePivots.guideDescription: Understanding how to use multiple timeframe analysis
multiTimeframePivots.dailyPivotsDesc: Best for intraday trading. Levels reset each day based on previous session.
multiTimeframePivots.weeklyPivotsDesc: Medium-term levels. Great for swing trades and identifying major zones.
multiTimeframePivots.monthlyPivotsDesc: Long-term levels. Used for position trading and major support/resistance.
multiTimeframePivots.confluenceZonesDesc: When levels from multiple timeframes align, they become stronger.
multiTimeframePivots.highProbabilityLevels: High-probability levels where multiple timeframes align
multiTimeframePivots.selectSymbolPrompt: Select a symbol and click "Fetch All Timeframes" to view multi-timeframe pivot analysis

alerts.title: Pivot Alerts
alerts.description: Set alerts for price proximity, breakouts, and rejections
alerts.guideDescription: How to set up and use pivot alerts effectively
alerts.priceApproachingDesc: Get notified when price comes within a threshold of a pivot level. Great for preparing entries.
alerts.breakoutAlertDesc: Triggered when price breaks through a level with momentum. Useful for trend-following trades.
alerts.rejectionAlertDesc: Triggered when price tests a level and reverses. Perfect for counter-trend or bounce trades.
alerts.proTip1: Set proximity alerts on R1/S1 for high-probability setups
alerts.proTip2: Use breakout alerts on R2/S2 for extended moves
alerts.proTip3: Rejection alerts work best at R3/S3 extremes
alerts.calculateFirst: Calculate pivot levels first to set up alerts
alerts.alertsNote: Alerts are stored locally in your browser. For real-time notifications, connect to a WebSocket service or enable browser notifications.

intradayRecalculation.title: Intraday Recalculation
intradayRecalculation.description: Recalculate pivots using current session's high/low for dynamic levels
intradayRecalculation.guideDescription: Master dynamic pivot levels for real-time trading decisions
intradayRecalculation.whatIsItDesc: Traditional pivots use yesterday's high/low/close. Intraday recalculation uses today's developing high/low to create dynamic levels that adapt as the session progresses.
intradayRecalculation.midSessionDesc: After a significant move breaks original pivots
intradayRecalculation.gapDaysDesc: When market opens far from previous close
intradayRecalculation.afternoonTradingDesc: To get fresh levels for the second half
intradayRecalculation.bullishShiftDesc: New pivot is higher than original. Market is showing strength - look for long entries at new supports.
intradayRecalculation.bearishShiftDesc: New pivot is lower than original. Market is showing weakness - look for short entries at new resistances.
intradayRecalculation.calculateFirst: Calculate original pivots first to enable intraday recalculation
intradayRecalculation.intradayNote: Intraday recalculation uses current session data to provide dynamic pivot levels. These are useful for adjusting your trading plan as the session progresses.

levelsChart.title: Pivot Levels Visualization
levelsChart.description: Support and resistance levels with current price
levelsChart.howToInterpret: How to interpret the pivot levels chart
levelsChart.resistanceDesc: Price barriers above current price. Expect selling pressure at these levels.
levelsChart.cprZoneDesc: Central Pivot Range - the day's equilibrium zone. Price tends to gravitate here.
levelsChart.supportDesc: Price floors below current price. Expect buying pressure at these levels.
levelsChart.currentPriceNote: Orange dashed line shows current price position relative to all levels.

arbitrage.headerDescription: Identify profitable arbitrage opportunities between COMEX and MCX markets with advanced analytics
arbitrage.inputDescription: Enter market prices and parameters for analysis
arbitrage.resultsDescription: Results will appear here after calculation
arbitrage.guideSubtitle: Learn how to identify and trade pricing inefficiencies between exchanges
arbitrage.whatIsArbitrageDesc: Arbitrage exploits price differences between COMEX (US) and MCX (India) for the same commodity.
arbitrage.fairValueCalcDesc: COMEX price × USDINR × conversion factor + import duty + costs = Fair Value
arbitrage.premiumDiscountDesc: When MCX > Fair Value = Premium (sell signal). When MCX < Fair Value = Discount (buy signal).
arbitrage.riskFactorsDesc: Currency fluctuations, timing gaps, and transaction costs can affect profitability.

usdinrSensitivity.title: USD/INR Sensitivity Analysis
usdinrSensitivity.description: Analyze how currency movements impact MCX fair value
usdinrSensitivity.breakEvenDesc: Every ₹1 change in USD/INR moves MCX Gold fair value by approximately

multiCommodityTracker.title: Multi-Commodity Tracker
multiCommodityTracker.goldPremiumHigher: Gold premium is higher than Silver - Gold may correct relative to Silver
multiCommodityTracker.silverPremiumHigher: Silver premium is higher than Gold - Silver may correct relative to Gold
multiCommodityTracker.premiumsAligned: Gold and Silver premiums are aligned - No divergence detected

history.title: Historical Arbitrage Data
history.noDataMessage: Start collecting arbitrage data by clicking 'Record Now'. Data will be stored for historical analysis.

heatmap.title: Arbitrage Heatmap
heatmap.strongDiscountDesc: MCX significantly underpriced - Strong long opportunity
heatmap.fairValueDesc: MCX fairly priced - No significant arbitrage
heatmap.strongPremiumDesc: MCX significantly overpriced - Strong short opportunity

spreadChart.priceComparisonDesc: Fair value vs MCX price analysis

arbitrage.fetchingPrices: Fetching Live Prices from COMEX & MCX...

hero.title: Still doing manual analysis
hero.description: Every hour you spend calculating pivot levels, checking COT reports, or comparing COMEX vs MCX prices is an hour you're not trading. And by the time you're done, the opportunity has already passed.

painPoints.title: The Hidden Cost
painPoints.description: If you're trading gold, silver, or commodities without proper tools, you're probably facing these problems every single day:

hoursWasted.title: Hours Wasted on Manual Analysis
hoursWasted.description: Calculating pivot levels, checking COT reports, comparing COMEX vs MCX prices... every single day. Time that could be spent actually trading.

missingOpportunities.title: Missing Profitable Opportunities
missingOpportunities.description: By the time you finish your analysis, the arbitrage window has closed. The seasonal pattern has already played out. The smart money has already moved.

gutFeel.title: Trading on Gut Feel
gutFeel.description: Without proper data, you're essentially gambling. No statistical edge, no backtested strategies, just hope and intuition.

painPoints.costTitle: What This Is Really Costing You

costs.time: Daily analysis time you could save
costs.profit: Potential arbitrage profits missed per month
costs.winRate: Better win rate with seasonal timing

correlation.headerDescription: Analyze correlation between multiple assets to build a well-diversified portfolio
correlation.resultsDescription: Results will appear here after calculation
correlation.learnCorrelation: Learn how correlation values help build diversified portfolios
correlation.positiveCorrelationDesc: Perfect positive - assets move together in the same direction.
correlation.zeroCorrelationDesc: No relationship - assets move independently of each other.
correlation.negativeCorrelationDesc: Perfect negative - assets move in opposite directions.
correlation.diversificationDesc: Low correlation between assets provides better risk reduction.
correlation.assetsHint: Enter 2-5 asset symbols separated by commas
correlation.rollingDescription: Track how correlation changes over time between two assets

heatmap.title: Correlation Heatmap
heatmap.positiveCorrelationDesc: Assets move in the same direction
heatmap.diversificationTipDesc: Choose assets with low or negative correlation

rollingChart.title: Rolling Correlation
rollingChart.volatilityWarning: The correlation between these assets has varied significantly (range:
rollingChart.volatilityWarningEnd: ). This relationship may be unstable and less reliable for trading decisions.

betaCalculator.title: Beta (Sensitivity) Calculator
betaCalculator.description: Calculate how much an asset moves relative to a benchmark
betaCalculator.selectAssetsAnalyze: Select assets and click Calculate to analyze

multiPeriodComparison.title: Multi-Period Correlation Analysis
multiPeriodComparison.description: Compare correlation across different time periods (30d, 90d, 6m, 1y)
multiPeriodComparison.strongerThanNorm: Relationship stronger than historical norm - may revert to mean
multiPeriodComparison.weakerThanNorm: Relationship weaker than historical norm - watch for regime change
multiPeriodComparison.selectAssetsCompare: Select two assets and click Compare to analyze

diversificationAnalysis.title: Portfolio Diversification Analysis
diversificationAnalysis.description: Analyze how well your portfolio assets are diversified
diversificationAnalysis.addAssetsAnalyze: Add assets and click Analyze to check portfolio health

tradingSignals.title: Correlation-Based Trading Signals
tradingSignals.description: Generate trading signals based on divergence, lead-lag, and correlation analysis
tradingSignals.selectAssetsGenerate: Select assets and click Generate to analyze
